amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to transfer weapons to the Palestinian Authority.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to transfer weapons to the Palestinian Authority.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A067) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A067) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A067) offered by Mr. King (IA).
